    )
)

## Feature Engineering

```{r split_data}


data = read.csv("scotland_avalanche_forecasts_2009_2025.csv")


train.idx <- sample(1:nrow(data), 
                    round(nrow(data)*0.8))

train <- data[train.idx,] #Training data
test <- data[-train.idx,] #Testing Data


```

```{r missing_val}

#Getting table of missing values


col.n <- colnames(data)
n <- nrow(data)

missing_df <- data.frame(Variable = character(),
                         "Missing (%)" = numeric(),
                         check.names = F)


for (i in col.n){
  
  x <- sum(is.na(data[,i]))
  
  perc <- (x/n) * 100
  
  missing_df <- rbind(missing_df,
                      data.frame(
                        Variable = i,
                        `Missing (%)` = perc
                      , check.names = F)
                      )
  
}
 
missing_df <- missing_df %>% 
  filter(`Missing (%)` > 0) %>% 
  arrange(desc(`Missing (%)`),)


```

```{r tablex}



kable(missing_df, 
      format = "html",
      digits = 2,
      caption = "Missing Values") %>%
  kable_styling(
    bootstrap_options = c("hover"),
    full_width = FALSE
  ) %>%
  footnote(general = "")



```
